p:
A real-time nanopore sequencing strategy with previously developed primers
21 , was applied to both RT-qPCR-positive samples. For these samples, extracted RNA was converted to cDNA using GoScript™ Reverse Transcriptase (Promega) and random hexamer priming. Whole-genome amplification by multiplex PCR was attempted using GoTaq® qPCR Master Mix (Promega), the 500bp sequencing primer scheme and 35 cycles using the adapted protocol
21 . Electrophoresis (2% agarose gel) was used to confirm the expected bands and to purify the specific amplicons using Invitrogen™ E-Gel™ SizeSelect, followed by quantification using fluorimetry with the Qubit dsDNA High Sensitivity assay on the Qubit 3.0 instrument (Life Technologies).
